decision_conditions: The applicant has failed to demonstrate through the submission of robust evidence that the proposed gate and widening of the driveway would not result in an unacceptable adverse impact upon the longevity, health and appearance of the protected trees which contribute towards the character and appearance of Coombe Hill Conservation Area. Therefore, the proposed development would fail to preserve the character and appearance of the Coombe Hill Conservation Area Conservation Area, contrary to Policies CS8, DM10 and DM12 of the Council's adopted LDF Core Strategy April 2012, Policy G7 of the London Plan 2021 and guidance in the Royal Borough of Kingston upon Thames Residential Design Guide SPD 2013.

Insufficient information has been submitted to demonstrate that the development would not increase groundwater flood risk or be at risk of unsafe groundwater flooding contrary to Policy SI13 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS1 and DM4 of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted (2012).
application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
description: Demolition of single storey side extension and erection of part single/part two storey side extension. Erection of two storey rear extension. Erection of roof extension including 6no. dormer roof extensions and enlargement of existing side dormer roof extension to facilitate loft conversion. Erection of basement extension with pool. Erection of front porch canopy and changes to ground floor front and side fenestrations. Extension to ground floor garden terrace. Installation of sliding vehicular gate and new brick piers.
